snippet.title: The Wickie - Journey of a Lighthouse Keeper Gameplay Trailer 2
snippet.description:
🌌 Discover the Mystery of Pandora’s Rock in The Wickie 🌊

Step into the world of The Wickie, a first-person cosmic horror adventure set in the eerie Outer Hebrides. Unravel dark secrets, explore breathtaking landscapes, and protect the shipping lanes—all while battling to keep your sanity.

🎥 What You'll See in the Trailer:

Stunning island environments and eerie cosmic horror vibes.
Key characters, including Captain Malin, Nathan, and Nigel, plus glimpses of dialogue gameplay.
Failed experiments, tentacled horrors, and shadowy mysteries lurking in the deep blue sea.
Immersive puzzles, stormy lighthouses, and a chilling morse code message.
🎮 Wishlist The Wickie now on Steam (or PlayStation Store, etc.)!
🕹 Launching Q4 2024 (PC) / Q1 2025 (PS5 & Xbox).

#CosmicHorror #TheWickie #IndieGames #LovecraftianAdventure #GameTrailers
